text:
="preserve">Zithulele Patrick Mvemve (31 May 1941 – 6 July 2020) was a South African Roman Catholic bishop. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1969. He was titular bishop of "Luperciani" and as auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Johannesburg, South Africa, from 1988 to 1994. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Klerksdorp, South Africa, from 1994 to 2013.
Mvemve died on 6 July 2020 in Johannesburg, aged 79.
